strapiPost.title: Game Time
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by University of Arkansas Athletics
strapiPost.content:
Kick it with Razorback Soccer on Friday night for the NCAA Tournament’s second round at the Razorback Field. 

  • Kick off: At 6:30p on Friday, #2 seed Arkansas will square off against Virginia Tech. If the Hogs win this one, they’ll advance to their second straight Sweet 16 appearance. 
  • With a win: The Razorbacks will host the winner of Purdue and Notre Dame on Sunday at 4:30p at Razorback Field. Let’s rally for the Razorbacks! 

Get your tickets for the weekend starting at just $5 by clicking HERE.
